about_the_game: Experience the weird world of Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop, but through your ears! This original music, composed by Tom Rumbellow and Michael Samuel-Bryan, is the perfect soundtrack to your day, whether you're fixing spaceships, saving the universe or getting murdered by your capitalist pig boss.
detailed_description: Experience the weird world of Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop, but through your ears! This original music, composed by Tom Rumbellow and Michael Samuel-Bryan, is the perfect soundtrack to your day, whether you're fixing spaceships, saving the universe or getting murdered by your capitalist pig boss.
